name: Penne with Chili, Chicken, and Prawns
author: LOVELYLIV
summary: A lovely spicy, EASY, fresh, tomatoey pasta dish with lots of kick! Pasta, chicken, bacon, and shrimp combined with chili come together as my all time favourite pasta dish! I have estimated the ingredients, as I usually just throw it all together.
ingredients: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
1 (26 ounce) jar spicy red pepper pasta sauce
½ pound medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
1  fresh red chile pepper, finely chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Place penne pasta in the pot, cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente, and drain
Place chicken, bacon, and garlic in a large skillet over medium heat, and cook 10 minutes, until bacon is evenly brown and chicken juices run clear
Continue cooking until sauce is heated through
Cook 2 minutes, or until shrimp are opaque
Toss with cooked pasta and 1/2 the Parmesan cheese just before serving
